description: Twelve-character code based on the three-digit ISO country codes and the nine-digit monitor location code.
name: site

description: Status of the data.
name: data_status

description: Action code for data ingest
name: action_code

description: Date and time of the data value
name: datetime

description: Five-digit number used to identify the parameters being monitored.
name: parameter

description: Measurement period in minutes.
name: duration

description: How often the measurement is repeated (minutes).
name: frequency

description: Data value of the specified parameter.
name: value

description: Three-digit code used to describe the units in the measurement of the specified parameter.
name: unit

description: An integer code used to link to the quality control codes that describe the validity, invalidity, or questionable status of the measurement.
name: qc

description: Parameter occurrence code (POC)
name: poc

description: Latitude in decimal degrees of the monitor.
name: latitude

description: Longitude in decimal degrees of the monitor.
name: longitude

description: The datum associated with the latitude and longitude measurements used to plot the data in geographic information systems (GIS).
name: gisdatum

description: Elevation of the monitor in meters above mean sea level (MSL).
name: elev

description: Three-digit numerical code that identifies the method used to perform the measurement.
name: method_code

description: Measurement Performance Characteristic (MPC) is a performance measurement for the measurement taken.
name: mpc

description: Value of the MPC needs to be in the same units as the specified parameter being measured.
name: mpc_value

description:
Uncertainty needs to be in the same units as the
specified parameter and is given using the 95% confidence level.
name: uncertainty

description: The text field in which each qualifier is separated by a space.
name: qualifiers

description: Name of the file from FTP server.
name: file_name

description: Date where data ingested to BigQuery.
name: record_date

description: Timestamp when the pipeline started.
name: ingestion_timestamp
